messages.subject: Proposal Review - Marketing Cloud Lite
messages.text: Hi Emily, I wanted to follow up on the proposal we sent last week regarding Marketing Cloud Lite. Let me know if you had a chance to review it — happy to hop on a call to walk through the details. Best

messages.subject: Re: Proposal Review - Marketing Cloud Lite
messages.text: Hi Bruce, I saw it. The price seems high for what you're offering. Not convinced it's what we need right now. – Emily

messages.subject: Re: Proposal Review - Marketing Cloud Lite
messages.text: Thanks for the quick reply. Totally understand — would it help if I sent over a breakdown of how each feature maps to your current challenges? Let me know what's most important to your team and we

messages.subject: Re: Proposal Review - Marketing Cloud Lite
messages.text: Honestly, we're looking at other vendors too. Yours is the priciest. If there's no room to come down, we probably won't proceed. – Emily On Mon, Jul 7, 2025 at 3:45 PM Bruce Wayne <bruce

messages.subject: Re: Proposal Review - Marketing Cloud Lite
messages.text: Appreciate the honesty. There may be flexibility if we can structure a phased rollout. Would you be open to that? Also happy to compare features head-to-head if you'd like. Best, Bruce On Mon, Jul

messages.subject: Re: Proposal Review - Marketing Cloud Lite
messages.text: We don't have time for a long rollout. Either it works out-of-the-box or we're not interested. – Emily On Mon, Jul 7, 2025 at 3:46 PM Bruce Wayne <bruce.wayne.goatforce@gmail.com> wrote:

messages.subject: Re: Proposal Review - Marketing Cloud Lite
messages.text: Got it. I'll revise the proposal with a focus on rapid deployment and get back to you by end of day. Let me know if there's anything else I should consider. – Bruce

messages.subject: Re: Proposal Review - Marketing Cloud Lite
messages.text: Send whatever you want, but just FYI — legal won't even look at it unless it's under $90K. – Emily On Mon, Jul 7, 2025 at 3:47 PM Bruce Wayne <bruce.wayne.goatforce@gmail.com> wrote: Got

messages.subject: Re: Proposal Review - Marketing Cloud Lite
messages.text: Understood. I'll aim to get it as close as possible to that number and outline tradeoffs clearly. Appreciate your patience, Emily. Best, Bruce On Mon, Jul 7, 2025 at 3:47 PM Emily Johnson <emily

messages.subject: Re: Proposal Review - Marketing Cloud Lite
messages.text: Let's just pause for now. I'll circle back if leadership is still interested. – Emily On Mon, Jul 7, 2025 at 3:48 PM Bruce Wayne <bruce.wayne.goatforce@gmail.com> wrote: Understood. I

summary: The sales thread between Bruce Wayne (rep) and Emily Johnson (prospect) centers on the Marketing Cloud Lite proposal. Emily consistently raises strong objections regarding pricing, value, and budget, setting a firm limit of under $90K and rejecting complex rollouts in favor of an out-of-the-box solution. Bruce attempts to address these concerns by offering to revise the proposal for rapid deployment and cost adjustment. However, the conversation ultimately stalls, with Emily deciding to pause discussions and only circle back if her leadership shows renewed interest.
